articles.title: Korean People's Cause of Reunification Supported
DPRK Lauded
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of Reunification Supported 
   Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Uganda-DPRK Friendship Association in a joint statement on Jan. 2 said that the joint New Year editorial made public in the DPRK called for attaching importance to the nation, defending peace and achieving unity, adding that these three tasks indicate the way of bringing earlier Korea's reunification. The statement extended unequivocal support to it. 
 It demanded the U.S. stop hamstringing the Korean people's efforts to settle the issue of Korea's reunification by their own efforts and immediately withdraw its aggressor troops from south Korea.    
 It reiterated their continued positive support and solidarity for the Korean people in their just cause of achieving national reunification on the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity.
